subject: packaging: change u-boot binary install directory
commitMessage:
packaging: change u-boot binary install directory

Instead of installing the u-boot binary to the /boot/u-boot,
we'll choose /var/tmp/u-boot because it is only required to
find from .ks file which generates the boot image.

Change-Id: I256ac8127a4c38d361f436fc5d06b48a78c2f76e
Signed-off-by: Chanho Park <chanho61.park@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Cherry Picked

This patchset was cherry picked to branch tizen_boot as commit 5ce1d7f6b5c494eabc0951ede220ad2de66b6201
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: Logo: TIZEN: Change booting logo size to official size.
commitMessage:
Logo: TIZEN: Change booting logo size to official size.

Since TIZEN group has been used 450 X 140 bmp logo for lunchbox,
this patch tries to change the logo size from 500 X 150 to official size.
By reducing image size, we also save about 35KB.

To make row aligned 4 bytes, add 2 pixels to row. Therefore the real width
of image size is 452.

Change-Id: Id5e27b980e4582bf9c4d19ac7f7b80269ab7cc7c
Signed-off-by: Jonghwa Lee <jonghwa3.lee@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

I tested gzip and raw bmp version - is good.

Patch Set 1:

Do you take screen density (pixels per physical length unit) into account?

Patch Set 1:

No, I didn't consider it. I just set image to center as it used to be. The coordination of logo image was (550, 150), so I configured offset to place image to that point.
I don't know where I can apply screen density and even check. Could you more elaborate about this?

Patch Set 1: -Verified -Code-Review

This is taken into account in library code. But please don't modify it in this commit because it needs to be rewritten at all since a lot of values are set to constant and valid only for Trats2 board. I am working on battery charger with some battery screen and then I will probably made some code cleanup here.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: u-boot.spec update to build u-boot.bin and u-boot-mmc.bin.
commitMessage:
u-boot.spec update to build u-boot.bin and u-boot-mmc.bin.

Change-Id: I4b0f60d0ceee7b1c19a362e6051934b732e48784
Signed-off-by: Jacek Pielaszkiewicz <j.pielaszkie@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

Why do you install u-boot binary in the /boot/u-boot?
We don't store the u-boot in there.
The u-boot is stored in raw partition. Thus we can't update the u-boot using rpm installer.

Patch Set 1:

I was asked to update u-boot spec to be posible generate ready for use u-boot image. Currently u-boot mast be builded manually. 
I have choosen /boot/u-boot directory becuase I didn't find better place.
To install correctly u-boot probably *.ks that creates system image (containg u-boot, s-boot and kernel) should be updated.

Patch Set 1:

We want to have u-boot*bin in .rpm package (like everything else) so we can create complete (and up-to-date) images when building platform images.

We just have to have it somewhere to create images in proper format.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: serial: s5p: set automatically clears after resetting Rx FIFO
commitMessage:
serial: s5p: set automatically clears after resetting Rx FIFO

This patch fix the u-boot shell problem:
 - If hold the key while booting is in progress,
   white spaces are written in u-boot shell.

Set Automatically clears after resetting Rx FIFO.

Change-Id: I7d7f12051f67e10866fe810110a69c5dab17d5ff
Signed-off-by: Inha Song <ideal.song@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

Inha, please send this patch to u-boot mailing list.
It is crucial for MO/TRATS2 board.

Patch Set 1: Cherry Picked

This patchset was cherry picked to change: I7d7f12051f67e10866fe810110a69c5dab17d5ff
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
